attributes.action: Let people carry locking knifes not longer then 3 inch,pepper spray for self def
attributes.additional_details: I want Government to try to understand that existing Law is not working people getting stabbed and killed  normal person cant carry knife or pepper spray for self defence so bad person knows that they have a knife and they will attack u if u lucky they will take your stuff and leave u alone but but knife crime is over the ruff and existing law do not work people must have a chance to protect themselves and they families and use it a knife or pepper spray to scare !
attributes.background: I want to try change law and understanding for knife crime in uk we people cant protect ourself and police dont have resources people get stabbed and killed the law got is not working we got one of the highest rate of knife crimes in EU criminals knows we have nothing to protect ourselves !

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577568

If you specifically want locking knives of 3 inches and under to be legal to carry we could accept a petition requesting this.
